title: Education and Training: The Learning Community
subject: CTE (2022-)

document.title: CAREER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION PROGRAM OF STUDIES HIGH SCHOOL 2021 - 2022

814147091DA9497B8F5E8562246215FB.description:
Context for Great Teaching: profiles of effective educators, edTPA101, National
Board 101: five core propositions, myth busting: superhero teachers, the history
of teaching, unions, collective bargaining, due process, professional associations
and organizations for educators.

45EC91E7EA744E65B04556D82920C593.description:
Planning a Path: career pathways, roles, and opportunities, being a professional,
unpacking the Educators Rising standards report.

2F4B643A81074C4497FBC99C7296C709.description:
Understanding the School System: purpose of school, school system: federal vs.
state vs. local, local governance, policy making, school funding including Title I 
2021 – 2022 Program of Studies Page 382 of 1056
of ESEA (Elementary and Secondary Education Act), district and school budgets,
accountability systems, salary schedules and trends, types of schools.

5CF03231BE1D44DCA9092397F6225647.description:
Know the structures that govern a school and school systems, understand the role of the
professional educator within these systems, and practice developing a personal
professional identify and career path.

4A4C39130E0F46F396AA9315EFAA47D5.description:
Local Community: civic engagement, community organizations, supporting
social justice at home, researching your community, local/regional culture,
identifying equity

12D3725BA47048D99238C4A41A8CDE8C.description:
Colleagues: collaboration with colleagues, working with administrators,
extracurricular activities.

B56E3D0E5AAD46C4A0001654AD99DD2E.description:
Partners: understanding the roles of stakeholders, building relationships with
families and caregivers, talking about a student with families and caregivers,
mapping resources available to support students.

707A624969AB462CA8445EF0E3D08BA3.description:
Know the structure of communities within and beyond the school, understand how these
communities form and interconnected system of systems, and practice connecting and
reflecting on these communities.

B6C6D24187C54E3EB7F91F27939E74F4.description: Planning: Standards 101, Curriculum 101, understanding by design.

292A097185054279BCB3C0967BFC6F3A.description:
Know the language of the work of teaching, understand the cycle of planning,
implementing evaluating and reflecting on a lesson, and practice planning, implementing,
reflecting on and revising classroom practice.

9099846C333340FEA68AFD8B986AAC3C.description:
Connecting with Students: cultural competence, expectations for students,
building mutual respect, establishing boundaries.

A2027C8E7E1F44179CB3E9B384546A0E.description:
Leadership: common characteristics of successful leaders, credibility, unpack
concept of credibility and trustworthiness, habits of effective speakers.

67A885BAB7744480898AAD52E14F3F61.description: Personal Expectations: professionalism, becoming a change agent.

DD39FBB08EE24324B14002FFCE213832.description:
Self-Awareness: my identity, understanding bias, understanding equity, my
values, StrengthsFinder, empathy, teacher impact, teacher persona.

2C195BAB67944FEA8DFDC61D58432632.description:
Know, practice and reflect on concepts relating to the personal characteristics of
education professionals.
